other_tests.findings: Single enlarged parathyroid gland was removed.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Ten years later, the patient had a recurrence of hyperparathyroidism and three enlarged parathyroid glands.

other_tests.procedure_name: Total parathyroidectomy, thyroidectomy, thymectomy, and parathyroid autograft
other_tests.findings: Three enlarged parathyroid glands were noted.
Mild elevation of gastrin level (290 pg/ml) was detected in relative II-2, attributed to atrophic gastritis.

other_tests.procedure_name: RT-PCR of MEN1 mRNA from patientâ€™s blood
other_tests.findings: An abnormal mRNA of greater size (829 bp) was present due to the retention of unspliced intron 9.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The normal fragment (629 bp) was present alongside the mutant fragment (829 bp) in affected family members.
